+ "\nNow you have " + tasks.size() + " tasks in the list.\n");
The description of the deadline task must include the ddl time, please try again.
Tips: use '/by' to enter the ddl date.
System.out.println("The description of the event task cannot be empty, please try again.");
System.out.print("Got it. I've added this task:\n  "
+ "\nNow you have " + tasks.size() + " tasks in the list.\n");
The description of the event task must include the start time and the end time, please try again.

* Represents a command. As abstract class, all types of Command inherit from this class.
* Executes the command and save changes to the task list file if needed.
* @param tasks The TaskList the method interacts with.
* @param storage The Storage object used to save the new task list.
public abstract void execute(TaskList tasks, Storage storage);

/** Constructs a deadline task with information, including description and ddl date.

* containing the ddl date, is in the other string.

* Returns The message containing basic information of this task.
* This task: Type of task: Deadline, whether it is done, description and ddl date
* @return The message containing basic information of this task.
/** Constructs an event task with information, including description, start time and end time.

* The start time, is in the second string of the array,
